# Overview

This website contains several mini-courses that cover tools for modeling and data science. The topics covered is based on the tools we regularly use and teach.


* The [**About**](/pages/about.qmd) page give a brief overview of what this site is trying to be all about (and what it doesn't do).

* The main content comes in the form of [courses](/courses/courses.qmd), which are further divided into modules and units. Learn more about this on the [courses](/courses/courses.qmd) site.
